individuals.name: Mohamed
individuals.persona: A computer science student interested in studying the algorithms behind digital media platforms

individuals.name: Eve
individuals.persona: A fellow parent who shares tips and recommendations for unique cake designs

conversationStarter: Eve, it's nice to see you at the block party! I was just thinking about how to balance my interest in algorithms with my other hobbies. How do you manage to find time for your cake designs while being a parent?
